Classification on hepatitis for hepatitis_data with adaboost.

	- View name : hepatitis_data	 View shape : (155, 19)

	- Labels used : LIVE, DIE
	- Number of cross validation folds : 7

Classifier configuration : 
	- Adaboost with n_estimators : 80, base_estimator : DecisionTreeClassifier
